channel.title: CVE Feed for Melapress -- WP Activity Log
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Melapress -- WP Activity Log

item.title: CVE-2023-50905|2024-08-02T22:23:44.036Z -- melapress -- wp%20activity%20log
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Melapress WP Activity Log allows Stored XSS.This issue affects WP Activity Log: from n/a through 4.6.1.

item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Melapress WP Activity Log allows Stored XSS.This issue affects WP Activity Log: from n/a through 4.6.1.
